scripts.templateService-test: newman run tests/TemplateService-Automate.postman_collection.json -d data/data-templateService.csv -e environment/dev-91.json --reporters cli,junit,html --reporter-junit-export newman/templateService-test-xml.xml --reporter-html-export newman/templateService-test-html.html

scripts.userService-test: newman run tests/UserService-Automate.postman_collection.json -d data/data-userService.csv -e environment/dev-91.json --reporters cli,junit,html --reporter-junit-export newman/userService-test-xml.xml --reporter-html-export newman/userService-test-html.html
scripts.userService-flowTest: newman run tests/UserService-FlowTest.postman_collection.json -d data/data-userService-flow.csv --reporters cli,junit,html --reporter-junit-export newman/userService-test-xml.xml --reporter-html-export newman/userService-test-html.html
